languages.text: "Поскольку ты, {name}, уже однажды помог{mf||ла} мне {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}умерить... аппетиты Каллигоса{/d}, я приглашу тебя на раздел его владений. Когда мы погасим бушующий пожар скверны, династия фон Валанциус может присоединиться к завоеванию миров этого нечестивца".

traits.locale_text: "Поскольку ты, {name}, уже однажды помог{mf||ла} мне умерить... аппетиты Каллигоса, я приглашу тебя на раздел его владений. Когда мы погасим бушующий пожар скверны, династия фон Валанциус может присоединиться к завоеванию миров этого нечестивца".
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Since you, {name}, helped me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}curb Calligos's... appetites{/d} once before, I will invite you to divide his territories with me. Once we have extinguished these roaring flames of wickedness, House von Valancius will be welcome to partake in the conquest of that profaner's worlds."
languages.original_text: "Поскольку ты, {name}, уже однажды помог{mf||ла} мне {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}умерить... аппетиты Каллигоса{/d}, я приглашу тебя на раздел его владений. Когда мы погасим бушующий пожар скверны, династия фон Валанциус может присоединиться к завоеванию миров этого нечестивца".

traits.locale_text: "Since you, {name}, have once helped me curb Calligos's... appetites, I will invite you to divide his territories with me. Once we have extinguished these roaring flames of wickedness, House von Valancius will be welcome to partake in the conquest of that profaner's worlds."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Since you, {name}, have once helped me curb Calligos's... appetites, I will invite you to divide his territories with me. Once we have extinguished these roaring flames of wickedness, House von Valancius will be welcome to partake in the conquest of that profaner's worlds."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Since you, {name}, have once helped me curb Calligos's... appetites, I will invite you to divide his territories with me. Once we have extinguished these roaring flames of wickedness, House von Valancius will be welcome to partake in the conquest of that profaner's worlds."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Since you, {name}, helped me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}curb Calligos's... appetites{/d} once before, I will invite you to divide his territories with me. Once we have extinguished these roaring flames of wickedness, House von Valancius will be welcome to partake in the conquest of that profaner's worlds."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Since you, {name}, helped me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}curb Calligos's... appetites{/d} once before, I will invite you to divide his territories with me. Once we have extinguished these roaring flames of wickedness, House von Valancius will be welcome to partake in the conquest of that profaner's worlds."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “{name}，既然你曾经帮助我{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}遏制住了卡里戈斯的……胃口{/d}，我愿意邀请你与我一起瓜分他的领地。等我们彻底熄灭这些熊熊燃烧的邪恶火焰之后，我非常欢迎冯·瓦兰修斯家族与我一起，征服那个亵渎者的世界。”
languages.original_text: "Since you, {name}, helped me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}curb Calligos's... appetites{/d} once before, I will invite you to divide his territories with me. Once we have extinguished these roaring flames of wickedness, House von Valancius will be welcome to partake in the conquest of that profaner's worlds."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，既然你你曾经帮助我遏制住了卡里戈斯的……胃口，我愿意邀请你与我一起瓜分他的领地。等我们彻底熄灭了这些熊熊燃烧的邪恶之火之后，我非常欢迎冯·瓦兰修斯家族一起来征服那个亵渎者的世界。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「{name}、お前は以前、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}カリゴスの…食欲を抑える{/d}手伝いをしてくれたのだから、その土地を共に分けあおう。我らがこの悪の燃え盛る炎を消した後で、フォン・ヴァランシウス家が冒涜者の惑星征服に参加することを歓迎しよう」
languages.original_text: "Since you, {name}, helped me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}curb Calligos's... appetites{/d} once before, I will invite you to divide his territories with me. Once we have extinguished these roaring flames of wickedness, House von Valancius will be welcome to partake in the conquest of that profaner's worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、お前は以前、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}カリゴスの…食欲を抑える{/d}手伝いをしてくれたのだから、その土地を共に分けあおう。我らがこの悪の燃え盛る炎を消した後で、フォン・ヴァランシウス家が冒涜者の惑星征服に参加することを歓迎しよう」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Ya que usted, {name}, me ayudó en el pasado a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}frenar el... apetito de Calligos{/d}, {mf|le|la} invitaré a repartir sus territorios conmigo. Una vez hayamos extinguido las llamas de maldad, la casa von Valancius será bienvenida a participar en la conquista de los mundos del profanador».
languages.original_text: "Since you, {name}, helped me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}curb Calligos's... appetites{/d} once before, I will invite you to divide his territories with me. Once we have extinguished these roaring flames of wickedness, House von Valancius will be welcome to partake in the conquest of that profaner's worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Ya que usted, {name}, me ayudó en el pasado a frenar el apetito de Calligos, {mf|le|la} invitaré a repartir sus territorios conmigo. Una vez hayamos extinguido las llamas de maldad, la casa von Valancius será bienvenida a participar en la conquista de los mundos del profanador».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Da Ihr, {name}, mir schon einmal geholfen habt, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}Calligos' ... Appetit zu bändigen{/d}, lade ich Euch ein, seine Gebiete unter uns beiden aufzuteilen. Wenn wir diese lodernden Flammen des Bösen gelöscht haben, darf Haus Valancius gerne an der Eroberung der Welten dieses Blasphemisten teilnehmen."
languages.original_text: "Since you, {name}, helped me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}curb Calligos's... appetites{/d} once before, I will invite you to divide his territories with me. Once we have extinguished these roaring flames of wickedness, House von Valancius will be welcome to partake in the conquest of that profaner's worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Da Ihr, {name}, mir einst geholfen habt, Calligos' ... Appetit zu bändigen, lade ich Euch ein, seine Gebiete unter uns beiden aufzuteilen. Wenn wir diese lodernden Flammen des Bösen gelöscht haben, darf Haus Valancius gerne an der Eroberung der Welten dieses Blasphemisten teilnehmen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Puisque vous m'avez aidée à calmer les... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}appétits de Calligos{/d}, je vous propose de partager ses territoires avec moi, {name}. Dès que nous aurons éteint les flammes de la malfaisance, la maison von Valancius sera conviée à prendre part à la conquête des mondes de ce profanateur. »
languages.original_text: "Since you, {name}, helped me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}curb Calligos's... appetites{/d} once before, I will invite you to divide his territories with me. Once we have extinguished these roaring flames of wickedness, House von Valancius will be welcome to partake in the conquest of that profaner's worlds."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque vous m'avez aidée à calmer les... appétits de Calligos, je vous propose de partager ses territoires avec moi. Dès que nous aurons éteint les flammes de la malfaisance, la maison von Valancius sera conviée à prendre part à la conquête des mondes de ce profanateur. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "{name}, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}Calligos'un... İştahını dizginlemem{/d} konusunda bana yardım ettiğin için seni onun diyarlarını benimle paylaşmaya davet ediyorum. Cayır cayır yanan bu kötülük alevlerini söndürmemizin ardından von Valancius Hanesi, o günahkârın dünyalarının fethinde yer almakta özgürdür."
languages.original_text: "Since you, {name}, helped me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}curb Calligos's... appetites{/d} once before, I will invite you to divide his territories with me. Once we have extinguished these roaring flames of wickedness, House von Valancius will be welcome to partake in the conquest of that profaner's worlds."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}Calligos'un... İştahını dizginlemem{/d} konusunda bana yardım ettiğin için seni onun diyarlarını benimle paylaşmaya davet ediyorum. Cayır cayır yanan bu kötülük alevlerini söndürmemizin ardından von Valancius Hanesi, o günahkârın dünyalarının fethinde yer almakta özgürdür."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
